alert.note: Alert for Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 6:22PM EDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan...Wisconsin... Menominee River near Koss affecting Menominee and Marinette Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Menominee River near Koss. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water floods a boat landing near the gauge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
